item.title: About

item.title: Job Board
item.description: This space is opened to everyone who wants to share job opportunites that could be useful for SREs looking for new challenges. Here’s a curated list of sites where you can find new jobs opportunities. Boards Welcome to the Jungle welcometothejungle.co/en/jobs Remote Ok remoteok.io/remote-sre-jobs Companies Grafana Labs boards.greenhouse.io/grafanalabs Mirakl Labs labs.mirakl.jobs DataDome welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/datadome/jobs Le Bon Coin Recrutement leboncoin.fr Datadog Engineering careers.datadoghq.com/engineering Criteo Labs criteo.com/careers InterCloud welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/intercloud/jobs Polyconseil welcometothejungle.
